comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Nancy Astor, Viscountess Astor (1879–1964), the wife of Waldorf Astor, 2nd Viscount Astor (1879–1952) and her son; William Waldorf Astor, 3rd Viscount Astor (1907–1966). If it is 1913 she would be 24 and her son would be 6 years old. She had two younger children in 1913, and they are not pictured. Irene Langhorne was the sister of Lady Astor and the wife of Charles Dana Gibson (1867–1944). Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nancy_Astor,_Viscountess_Astor
